body:
Hello fellow players of the Avicus Network, my name or rather IGN is Briqht. I hope to see anyone who reads this In-Game and really, anyone else. Here's a little bit of background information about myelf! : I don't play Avicus too often, really only with my friends... but as of now? I'm really starting to enjoy it. I live in Canada and speak one language and that is English. My name is Andrew and I'm currently 15 years of age. I'm not super well known in the Minecraft Community, but, some may know me. I play some games, including Minecraft and a few servers. I won't go too in depth about the games, but with the servers? I will. I often play Hypixel and Hive, sometimes MCBrawl and Mineplex, soon to be more, Avicus. Thank you for reading a little about me and I'm glad to be here. Have yourself a good and safe night / day. c: 

- Briqht

replies.body: Oh yes, we are dating. Thanks everyone for the warm welcome guys. BC? Yeah, I love it here, pretty nice. Won't lie though!!! I'd prefer to live in Ontario, I will soon though. c:
